story.title: Narative: This story covers basics test of main page

scenario.title: Check amount books on page
scenario.step: Then I check that page have 20 books

scenario.title: Check that book with title present on page

examples.step: Then I check that book with "<bookTitle>" title book present on page
Then I check that book with "Hacking Exposed Wireless" title book present on page
Then I check that book with "Silence On The Wire" title book present on page
Then I check that book with "Hackers" title book present on pageorg.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<[tru]e> but was:<[fals]e>
Then I check that book with "fUCKERS" title book present on pageorg.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<[tru]e> but was:<[fals]e>
